synopsis.text: Shinoa's squad, under Guren's command, embarks on a mission to save a young human girl, Riko, from the clutches of an enigmatic vampire named Shahar. The reason behind Riko's abduction remains shrouded in mystery, and Shahar seems to harbor no desire to drink her blood, instead treating her like a younger sibling. As the team delves deeper into the rescue operation, they find themselves entangled with other vampires, including Ferid and Crowley. Will Yuu and his teammates successfully navigate these challenges and bring Riko back to her family? This captivating tale unfolds before the events of the 'Battle in Nagoya' arc in "Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign â€“ Part 2."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
